thread.title: Merkel woos China as Trump poses new trade challenge

title: Merkel woos China as Trump poses new trade challenge
text:
Merkel woos China as Trump poses new trade challenge 3:46pm BST - 01:49
China has promised to welcome German firms and protect their investments. But as Sonia Legg reports, Chancellor Angela Merkel faces a delicate diplomatic balancing act on her two-day China visit, which is clouded by President Trump's trade threats and his decision to pull out of the Iran nuclear deal.
